Extras. Information: The company Corel has officially released a new version of the popular platform for video processing Pinnacle Studio 16. This is the first release from the Pinnacle Studio as long as the company Corel has acquired the business of the company for the production of consumer Avid video editing tools in July of this year. Today, the company is rolling Corel product line development Avid Studio, but will continue to supply close to the functionality of the package Corel VideoStudio Pro.
